name: Fitness World
address: Fitness World, 447 Interurban Wy, Vancouver, BC V5X 0C7

featured_reviews.review_id:
Good staff, good location, good value for price. Washroom cleanliness I think could be better, but the biggest issue is that this is the only gym I've been to that lacks sufficient safety clips for weights. I walked around the whole gym and asked around, but there was only 2 stations with enough clips. Staff encouraged you to buy your own clips.

I think it encourages the normalization of poor safety habits in the gym. It's just a matter of time some person tips the bar and injures someone next to them.

featured_reviews.review_id:
The gym is fantastic, with a well-equipped facility and a welcoming atmosphere that makes working out enjoyable. It's the perfect place to achieve your fitness goals,
My PT Gustavo was amazing! He's incredibly friendly and approachable, making every session very effective., knows the ins and outs of fitness, and is always flexible with my workout schedule. His motivation keeps me going strong.

highly recommended!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi J Ajex Jais,
This review made our day! It's always great to hear how we're able to support our members in accomplishing their goals, and helping them in their fitness journey!

I know Gustavo takes pride in his work and is passionate about getting his clients results!

Thank you again for the kind review!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Wanted to echo the lack of safety clips from one of the previous reviews. A gym should never be short on safety clips. This is just asking for an injury, which at this point is a matter of time.

Overall, the people there are nice and helpful. The gym is located in a nice area, close to skytrain and buses. The selection of equipment is pretty good. It does, however, get really crowded, which can be really frustrating as it can take a lot of time to just wait for the equipment and even just finding enough room to perform exercise like lunges etc. The smell can also be.. not the best.. But again, that is what you would expect with a high ratio of people per square meter. It is what you get with cheaper gyms, you get what you pay for.

featured_reviews.review_id: The employees here are great! Nice equipment and very well put together. Lucas, Sam, gopi and naas where really helpful and kind getting me started on my fitness journey, I really recommend trying out the gym! 10/10.
featured_reviews.review_text: The employees here are great! Nice equipment and very well put together. Lucas, Sam, gopi and naas where really helpful and kind getting me started on my fitness journey, I really recommend trying out the gym! 10/10.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great gym with great space and amazing trainers. I had Sam at the beginning and Gustavo towards the end as Personal Trainers. Sam was amazing with planning the diet and more athletic workouts. Gustavo towards the last few sessions and it was ROCK ON. He pushes you to the limits to a reach your goal and stay on top of you and I am seeing results already. PUMPING THE IRON.

He pushes you to the limits to a reach your goal and stay on top of you and I am seeing results already. PUMPING THE IRON.

featured_reviews.review_id: Honestly this gym is so unbelievably welcoming I have a hard time being consistent with the gym but I recently started going here and the trainers here are top notch amazing.  Lucas and Shush usually manning the front door are helpful as hell and super dope guys.  Sarah and Sam are also so genuine and always happy to see you. A month ago my body looked a whole lot different and honestly having a nice smile and genuine staff that are happy and excited for you to reach your goals really helps me to always come back. It's a 10/10 gym.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Wouldn't recommend. If you cancel your membership make sure you call and then follow up with an email with the date you called. They will charge you money for an additional month and not relay the message that you called earlier.

Additionally, personal training is very transactional. I dislike that they test your fitness level and issues in front of EVERYONE at the gym. Less than kind when delivering your fitness issues and what needs improvement. They're willing to help you IF you dish out the cash.  Wasn't impressed with my personal training experience especially after having a traumatic personal health issue happen prior to building the courage to attend the gym. Go to a community center gym.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Super busy at peak hours, really hard to get equipment and often there are big wait times for machines.
One of the most annoying things is there is barely any space, if you want to do RDLs or something you are constantly in people's ways and it's super awkward and uncomfortable.
The gym isn't very well maintained, there's equipment lying around everywhere and weights in random places, I don't see the staff doing any club runs or anything like that.
